database.tabs

Class WordPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • database.tabs.WordPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class WordPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    The Panel is a tabbedpanel of the main program. It consists of a metabox, where you can insert a word in the database, and a table with an overview over the table schlagwort from the database.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
